Localization information for Polymath Argent Bloodline Your power comes from a long line of ancestors that have spent time in the Ethereal Plane, a space between worlds that requires the use of force magic to be effective. As such your force based magics are elevated to heights unknown to most others. In the past these ancestors have been referred to as Argent Savants, masters of force magic and abjuration. Forceful Surge Point You channel this inborn energy into a surge of power that augments and enhances your offensive spells that deal force damage. Amped Shield Point Your bloodline generates excess abjuration magic that can be expended to protect yourself from harm. Energized Force magic flows through you and bolsters your resilience. When not wearing armor your AC is 13+Dex. Amped Shield Your bloodline generates excess abjuration magic that can be expended to protect yourself from harm. You may cast the shield spell without expending a spell slot and instead used a AMPED SHIELD POINT Forceful Surge You may channel inborn energy into a surge of power that augments and enhances your offensive spells that deal force damage. You may activate a Forceful Surge as a bonus action to increase the damage your force spells by your proficiency modifier. Energy Admix Your skill with force-based magic allows you to rewrite spells on the fly, allowing you to alter their properties. While this toggle is active, damaging spells you cast have their damage type converted to force damage Energy Admix: Transmuted Spell (Force) Changes elemental damage type to Force. Energy Admix: Transmuted Spell Enables changing the damage type of elemental Spells. Ethereal Overlord Your forceful surge is enhanced, increasing your connection to the ethereal plane. While active, you gain resistance to all damage and may teleport with Ethereal Step as a bonus action on your turn Ethereal Overlord: Ethereal Step While Forceful Surge is active, you may teleport 22m (60ft) as a bonus action on your turn Forceful Surge While in this state, damaging spells with the force damage type gain +X damage (X scales with sorc level) End Foreceful Surge Use a bonus action to end your Forceful Surge. Foreceful Surge Your surge makes you strong.

You have Advantage on Intelligence Checks and Saving Throws.
